ctu_text: answer": "Payment mode is Aadhar."}, {" question": "Whether DBT enabled bank account is required for NSMNY ?", " answer": "Yes, NSMNY scheme benefit is credited only in DBT enabled bank account."}, {" question": "Is it mandatory to link bank account with Aadhar ?", " answer": "Yes, it is mandatory to link bank account with Aadhar to get benefit of NSMNY."}, {" question": "Eligibility criteria of NSMNY scheme ?", "

ctu_text: answer": "The beneficiary should be eligible in PM KISAN scheme."}, {" question": "How to register for NSMNY scheme?", " answer": "No need to register for NSMNY scheme. The PM KISAN registered eligible beneficiary is the beneficiary of NSMNY."}, {" question": "Is this scheme is for group of farmers?", " answer": "No, This scheme is for only eligible farmer families."}, {"

ctu_text:
{"pageProps": {"schemeData": {"_id": "65cdec51cd96dc5e0754139e", "en": {"basicDetails": {"dbtScheme": true, "tags": ["Agriculture Land Holder", "Direct Benefit Transfer", "Family Scheme", "PM KISAN TOP UP"], "schemeName": "Namo Shetkari Mahasanman Nidhi Yojana", "schemeShortTitle": "NAMO SHETKARI MAHASANMAN NIDHI YOJANA", "implementingAgency": "Commissionerate Of Agriculture", "level": {"value": "state", "label": "State/ UT"}, "schemeCategory": [{"value": "628ce6ead6d1a3bde4685252", "label": "Agriculture,Rural & Environment"}], "schemeSubCategory": [{"value": "Financial assistance", "label": "Financial assistance"}], "schemeOpenDate": "2023-04-01", "targetBeneficiaries": [{"value": "individual", "label": "Individual"}], "state": {"value": 27, "label": "Maharashtra"}, "nodalDepartmentName": {"value": 27111111, "label": "Agriculture Department"}}, "schemeContent": {"references": [{"title": "Guidelines", "url": "https://fw.pmkisan.gov.in/Documents/RevisedPM-KISANOperationalGuidelines(English).pdf"}, {"title": "Online Link", "url": "http://nsmny.mahait.org/"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "• Under this scheme an amount of Rs. 6000/- will be transferred annually in three equal instalments • Government Resolution No Kisani-2023/CR 42/11 A dated 15/06/2023 has been issued regarding the scheme. • Farmers which are eligible for PM Kisan Yojana will be eligible for the benefit of "Namo Shetkari Mahasanman Nidhi Yojana"
", "benefits_md": "1) Eligible Farmers families as per PM KISAN will be Benefited Rs. 2000/- per Instalment. 2) The beneficiaries benefited in PM KISAN will get the benefit of NSMNY. 3) The NSMNY beneficiaries will be benefited from the list provided by GoI. 4) First instalment of NSMNY is given as per the list of 14th instalment of PMKISAN. 5) Eligible farmers family will get Rs. 2000/- from PMKISAN & NSMNY at each instalment. 6) Eligible farmers will get Rs. 12,000/- in a year from both PM KISAN & NSMNY schems. 7) Farmers will be benefited through DBT. 8) The benefit of the NSMNY will be credited only in Aadhar linked bank accounts. 9) The benefit credited to the ineligibles in NSMNY will be recovered as per the SoP of PMKISAN
", "exclusions_md": "The following categories of beneficiaries of higher economic status shall not be eligible for benefit under the scheme: (a) All Institutional Land holders; and (b) Farmer families in which one or more of its members belong to following categories: - Former and present holders of constitutional post. - Former and present Ministers/ State Ministers and former/present Members of Lok Sabha/ Rajya Sabha/ State Legislative Assemblies/ State Legislative Councils, former and present Mayors of Municipal Corporations, former and present Chairpersons of District Panchayats. - All serving or retired officers and employees of Central/ State Government Ministries /Offices/Departments and its field units Central or State PSEs and Attached offices /Autonomous Institutions under Government as well as regular employees of the Local Bodies (Excluding Multi-Tasking Staff / Class IV/Group D employees). - All superannuated/retired pensioners whose monthly pension is Rs.10,000/-or more (Excluding Multi Tasking Staff / Class IV/Group D employees. - All Persons who paid Income Tax in last assessment year. - Professionals like Doctors, Engineers, Lawyers, Chartered Accountants, and Architects registered with Professional bodies and carrying out profession by undertaking practices. - Non-Resident Indians (NRIs) ", "briefDescription": "To increase the income of farmers, State government has announced "Namo Shetkari Mahasanman Nidhi Yojana" in which cultivable land holding farmer families of the state will get an additional amount of Rs.

Note : - No need of approval at district and state level in case of direct registration at TNO login.
